activities.name: TableLoadDetails_Lookup
activities.description: Check [TableLoadDetails] to look for tables that should be loaded.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [iLogID]
      ,[sSourceSchemaName]+'.'+[sSourceTableName] as SourceTable
      ,[sDestinationSchemaName]+'.'+[sDestinationTableName] as DestinationTable
  FROM [ELT].[TableLoadDetails]
